U

updateInfo() - Method in class customer.EditProfileController
Updates the information only if the first name, last name, and email fields aren't blank and the email address matches a general email address regex.
updateInfo(int, String, String, String) - Method in class customer.EditProfileModel
Updates the customer information with new values that the user has entered
updateMovie(int, int) - Method in class application.ScreenModel
Updates the number of seats available of a particular movie given by movie ID, in the movies table of the database.
updateMovieSeats(int, int) - Method in class customer.ManageBookingsModel
Updates the number of available seats in the movies table of the database after a booking has been cancelled.
updateScreen(int, char[]) - Method in class application.ScreenModel
Updates the seating availability information of a particular movie given by movie ID, in the screen table of the database.
